title: Observations on the letter written to Sir Thomas Osborn, upon the reading of a book called The present interest of England stated written in a letter to a friend.
author: Bethel, Slingsby, 1617-1697.
notes: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
"April 17th. anno 1669 ..." [p.18-20] is an opinion by Denzel Holles concerning the case of Sir Francis Toppe. cf. Huntington Library.
Attributed to Slingsby Bethel. cf. BM.
